                                                                                                  ERA News and Events                           •       NARA releases Amendment 0001 to the  ERA          Request for Proposal  on 12/24/03.                        •       NARA hosts a Bidders' Conference and posts  answers        to RFP questions .                                    NARA News and Events                                 •    The People's Vote,  an exhibition of the documents voted as the most influential in U.S. history, is at the National Archives Building in Washington, DC, through March 4.  More about  The People's Vote  . . .                  •       A new book, Our Documents: 100 Milestone Documents from the National Archives, is filled with photos and information on all 100 documents.  Get your copy today!                     •            The  Charters of Freedom —the Constitution, the Bill of Rights, and the Declaration of Independence—are back! Visit the  National Archives Experience  to see our new exhibit. Conference  on 12/17/05 and posts  answers to RFP questions .                   •        NARA releases the  ERA Request for Proposal  on 12/05/03.                                                      NARA News and Events                     •    On Friday, December 26, all NARA research facilities will be closed. The Rotunda for the Charters of Freedom in Washington, DC, and all Presidential library museums will be open.                     •    The People's Vote,  an exhibition of the documents voted as the most influential in U.S. history, is at the National Archives Building in Washington, DC, through January 19.  More about  The People's Vote  . . .                  •       A new book, Our Documents: 100 Milestone Documents from the National Archives, is filled with photos and information on all 100 documents.  Get your copy today!
